name: ADHD Medication Management
description: Comprehensive 60-minute evaluation and ongoing ADHD management.
cancellation_policy: Cancel or reschedule at least 24 hours before your visit to avoid a fee.

name: Rapid Care Visit
description: Quick 30-minute visit for acute issues that need fast attention.
cancellation_policy: Rapid care visits can be cancelled or moved up to 12 hours before the start time.

name: Follow-Up Consultation
description: Focused 20-minute follow-up to review treatment progress.
cancellation_policy: Follow-up visits require 12 hours notice to cancel or reschedule without penalty.
